content:
Posted: September 7, 2016
Early Access Review
								Hi Joey,Great Title! Thank you.After playing it for a while, here are some of my suggestions/feedback.The glider needs to be closer and the rainbow needs to be killed off totally. I get really bad stutter when the rainbow is in the picture. I use the Gigabyte EXTREME Liquid cooled 1080 GTX. Quad core 4.2 GHZ proc and 16 megs of ram. The other island runs perfectly. I would also recommend changing the animated clouds, as they have lots of weird shapes around them. Also, a man after my own heart, Games never have enough ambience. You are on the correct path sir! The storm was great when it hit me! We need more stuff like that... birds..whales..ships..bugs..people overlooking cliffs..campfires..schools of fish..etc..the list goes on and on. This game will be incredible when out of early access. I am more than willing to help out, as I have been creating art all my life :} I know you have just added and artist to your team. So..I am sure, some major grafx updates will come soon enough! Also, the wind thermals need better art sir. I would personally love the choice of using controls also, not just move my head for turning. I would love it if i could just hold the vive wands in front of me, like i would be holding the pole, and steer..just like in real life :} Being that you named this Glider island, did u plan on any other types of machines ? Rocketbelt, mini motorized gliders, Skydiving..etc. I can easily seeing this game hitting top sales when completed. What you have done so far is epic to me! Cannot wait for your finished version. Thank you again Joey. I will play again after work..test some more..and contact you asap. I had sent you my email this morning also :]Thanks for knowledge and helping me with my project also!You are to kind sir!I hope the sales go up and up for you!

Posted: March 18
Early Access Review
								Better than I thought ir would be. I remeber when it first came out it recieved some negative reviews because of it's head tracking only control. I bought it after haptic feedback Vive controllers option was added. The way it let's you align the craft to exactly where you need it to be and the overall sensation of gliding around both work great. Nice addition to add some variety to your collection.

content:
Posted: September 20, 2016
Early Access Review
								I don't write many reviews and you may be looking at what I'm saying here and thinking "hey you only played 15 minutes... what do you know?"I pretty much saw all this game had to offer. You start at the top of an island mountain, run off the edge of some kind of plank, and then fly trying to collect rings. That's it. That's the whole game. Some rings are worth more than others... why? Cuz. The motion controls, moving your head to turn, dive and climb... AWFUL! Who thought that up? A game that may require quick manuvering and as much control as possible... LETS STRAP A 2 POUND DEVICE TO THE FRONT OF THEIR FACES AND THEN HAVE THEM MOVE THEIR HEAD AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE, AS WILDLY AS POSSIBLE TO FLY A HORRIBLY UNWEILDY AIRCRAFT! BRILLIANT!I hope that person got a raise. MY NECK IS KILLING ME! Getting an ice pack, some bio-freeze and a refund. VR shouldn't hurt.
